title: Sovereign Endpoint Detection and Response
meta_description: Sovereign Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) Solution is a premier cybersecurity service that combines IBM’s advanced QRadar EDR technology with our dedicated sovereign infrastructure located in Basel, Switzerland.
main_content: Sovereign Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) Sovereign Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) Solution is a premier cybersecurity service that combines IBM’s advanced QRadar EDR technology with our dedicated sovereign infrastructure located in Basel, Switzerland. What is Sovereign Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) Sovereign Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) ensures that clients receive top-tier protection with the assurance that their data remains within Swiss jurisdiction, adhering to the highest national and European security standards. Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) is a cybersecurity solution that continuously monitors end-user devices to detect and respond to threats such as ransomware and malware. By recording activities on endpoints, EDR provides security teams with the visibility needed to identify and address incidents that might otherwise go unnoticed. Key Features On-Premises Deployment Utilizing IBM’s QRadar EDR, our solution is deployed directly within our Basel-based infrastructure. This approach caters to organizations with stringent compliance requirements, offering greater autonomy over data residency and supporting environments with limited or no internet connectivity. Advanced Threat Detection QRadar EDR employs a behavioral detection approach to identify both known and unknown threats. By monitoring the behavior of running applications, it can detect anomalies and trigger alerts, ensuring swift identification and response to potential security risks. AI-Driven Automation Leveraging intelligent automation, QRadar EDR remediates endpoint threats in near real-time with minimal human intervention. This efficiency allows your security teams to focus on strategic initiatives while maintaining robust protection against cyber threats. Data Sovereignty and Compliance As a Swiss company, we adhere to the highest national and European security standards, including the Swiss Data Protection Act (DPA) and the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Our Sovereign EDR solution ensures that your data remains protected within Switzerland, providing a sovereign alternative to non-European providers. The best of both Worlds With combining ITNB’s deep cybersecurity expertise with Phoenix Technologies’ fully sovereign infrastructure in Switzerland, Sovereign Endpoint Detection and Response becomes truly unique. This partnership delivers top-tier threat detection and response while ensuring all data remains securely within Swiss jurisdiction, fully compliant with the strictest national and European regulations. Contact Us Certifications and Compliance Phoenix Technologies meets the highest standards for security and compliance, holding industry-leading certifications that demonstrate our commitment to protecting client data. Our sovereign infrastructure operates fully within Swiss jurisdiction, ensuring compliance with Swiss data protection laws, the EU’s GDPR, and other stringent regulatory frameworks. By aligning with recognized standards such as ISO/IEC 27001 for information security management and ISO/IEC 27017 for cloud security, we provide verifiable assurance that your workloads and sensitive information are safeguarded to the highest level.
